    • allocateVmForContainer

      public boolean allocateVmForContainer(Container container, List<ContainerVm> containerVmList)
      Description copied from class: ContainerAllocationPolicy
      Allocates a host for a given VM. The host to be allocated is the one that was already reserved.
      Specified by:
      allocateVmForContainer in class ContainerAllocationPolicy
      Parameters:
      container - virtual machine which the host is reserved to
      Returns:
      $true if the host could be allocated; $false otherwise
